amendment.description: Amendment sought to strikes section 10 of the legislation, which creates a duplicative size standard office in the Office of Advocacy without a commensurate reduction in the existing SBA Office of Size Standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 114-14 to strikes section 10 of the legislation, which creates a duplicative size standard office in the Office of Advocacy without a commensurate reduction in the existing SBA Office of Size Standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 234 (Roll no. 65).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Schrader.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 234 (Roll no. 65).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
